summary: A comprehensive Django test suite that validates delete operations across numerous edge cases, including cascade behavior, many-to-many through tables, generic relations, transaction management, concurrent locking, large batch deletions, ordered deletions, proxy model semantics, and targeted regression scenarios.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and stability of Django's delete functionality, preventing regressions and ensuring that complex relational and transactional delete scenarios behave as expected in production applications.
